Description: This guitar is incredible, It is currently set up in B standard with D'Addario Pro Steels, 14-70, the tone is epic. FEATURES Made in Nashville, TNMahogany bodyMaple topMahogany neck with rounded '59 Les Paul profile28" scale lengthComes strung with .13-.60 stringsEbony fingerboardPlatinum-plated hardware (brushed chrome look)Tune-o-matic bridge and stopbar tailpieceSilver top hat knobsKidney button tuning keys490R alnico magnet humbucker (neck)498T alnico magnet humbucker (bridge)2 volume, 2 tone, 3-way switchBlack reptile-pattern hardshell case with dark grey plush interior, black shroud, and silver silkscreened Gibson USA logo SPECIFICATIONS 17 peghead pitch0.818" thickness at nut0.963" thickness at 12th fret0.625" heel length18th fret neck joint28" scale21.332" total length1-11/16" nut width2.062" width at 12th fret24 frets I have included pictures of it next to a oversized Baritone Buckethead 27 scale and a SG 27 scale Baritone to compare the size. They are NOT included in this sale. There are some Very light finish cracks in the back of the headstock by the tuners. They are Very hard to see they are so hard to see they can't be captured in a picture!! And you have to really look hard in person. If you never said they were there you wouldn't find them!! But i am honest so i am disclosing it. It is normal nitro cracks for a 14 year old guitar. It is mint and beautiful for 14 years old!! Brand new ernie ball strap. The combination lock was never set. The factory plastic pin is still in it all at zero's. The instructions are included to set the pin number if you so choose.
Title: Gibson Les Paul Baritone 28 Scale very limited run (Rare)
